ModMetaData.name: Bens Fixes
ModMetaData.author: Ben Sokal
ModMetaData.description: - Change the power draw of the Standing Lamp from 30 to 15. - Change the radius of the Standing Lamp from 12 to 11. - Change the power draw of the Sunlamp from 2900 to 2400. - Add Hospitality icon to main tab bar - Add Mechanoids icon to main tab bar
